name: Dark Moodle (Portsmouth University)
description: Dark theme for Portsmouth Uni's Moodle site.

user.name: iPawk
user.about: Just a random computer scientist making things easier. Hope you enjoy my work. ;)

additional_info:
==CURRENT==
v1.34 - Fixed student profile and message system.

==OLD==
v1.32 - Small aesthetic fix for alert boxes and grades system.
v1.3 - Added missed styles for some forms and questionnaires. Fixed some select boxes.
v1.2 - Fixed missed info boxes etc. for some units. Fixed darkened image.
v1.01 - Fixed up login page & couple of images.
v1.0 - Release.
